short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that can help improve your productivity by limiting access to social media or any website the user choose to block.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The productivity extension is a powerful tool designed to enhance efficiency and focus while browsing the web. By seamlessly integrating with the Google Chrome browser, this extension empowers users to take control of their online productivity.

With the productivity extension installed, users can effortlessly block distracting or unproductive websites, helping them stay focused and on-task during work or study sessions. Whether it's social media, news websites, or other time-consuming sites, the extension provides customizable blocking options to suit individual preferences and productivity goals.

Install it today and take control of your online productivity journey!
